alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:56AM CST until January 03 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 815 AM CST. * At 656 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Snyder to 7 miles southwest of Beekman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Snyder around 700 AM CST. Montrose around 705 AM CST. Galion around 720 AM CST. Jones around 730 AM CST. Wilmot around 740 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bonita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
